Initialize Page (Express VI Creator Wizard)

Requires: Base Development System

Click the New button on the Create or Edit Express VI dialog box to display the Express VI Creator wizard and this page.

Use this page to specify whether you want to create an Express VI from an existing VI, from another Express VI, or from a blank VI.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Create from a VI—Opens dialog box pages that allow you to convert an existing standard VI to an Express VI.
  • Create from an Express VI—Opens dialog box pages that allow you to create an Express VI based on an existing Express VI.
  • Create from a blank VI—Opens dialog box pages that allow you to create an Express VI without using an existing standard VI or Express VI.
